text: Steve Lang (March 24, 1949 - February 4, 2017) was a Canadian rock musician. He was the bass guitarist for the band April Wine from 1976 to 1984. He was born in Montreal, Quebec. He was the father of musician Erin Lang (born 1979). Lang died on February 4, 2017 at the age of 67. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Canadian rock guitarists Category:Musicians from Montreal
title: Steve Lang
